Privacy doesnâ€™t mean hiding from regulation.
It means protecting users while staying compliant.

Billions is building exactly that layer.

@billions_ntwk 
@jgonzalezferrer

AI agents are no longer tools  they are actors.
Identity and accountability are not optional anymore.
Know Your Agent is the missing trust layer.

Billions Know Your Agent-  is a timely and powerful solution to one of AIâ€™s biggest gaps today , trust. As AI agents move from experiments to real decision makers, KYA introduces what the ecosystem truly needs verifiable identity, clear ownership, and transparent reputation. Built on the Deep Trust Framework, it smartly balances accountability with privacy, ensuring humans stay protected while AI agents remain fully answerable for their actions. @billions_ntwk 

What stands out is how practical and future ready the system is. With on chain attestations, decentralized identities, and enterprise grade security, KYA creates an open trust layer that works for builders, enterprises, and users alike. It doesn't rely on centralized gatekeepers and allows reputation to grow naturally through real usage. Overall, Know Your Agent sets a strong foundation for responsible, scalable, and trustworthy AI in the real world.  Identity and accountability for AI agents

AI agents are everywhere today.
They talk to users, take actions, and make important decisions.
But most AI agents have no real identity.
Without identity, there is no accountability.
And without accountability, trust is lost.

Billions Know Your Agent (KYA) solves this problem.
What is Know Your Agent?
Know Your Agent is a system that gives AI agents:

A real, verifiable identity

A clear owner who is responsible

A public reputation anyone can check

Built on the Deep Trust Framework, KYA connects AI agents, humans, and organizations using secure cryptography without giving up privacy or decentralization.

Why this matters now

AI agents are no longer just experiments.
They are becoming real economic and operational actors.

Enterprises need accountability

Builders need open and reliable infrastructure

Users need trust without depending on middlemen
Know Your Agent delivers all three.

How it works

              1. AI agents get a real identity
With the Agent JS SDK, an AI agent creates its own decentralized identity (DID).

              2. Trust is public and verifiable
Developers, auditors, and communities can add on chain proofs about an agent, such as:

Who owns it

How it is authenticated

Security audits
Reputation over time

Anyone can verify these claims.

             3. Privacy for humans, accountability for agents
Humans prove things using zero knowledge proofs.
AI agents use public attestations.
Privacy and accountability work together by design.

             4. Reputation grows over time
Ownership creates responsibility.
Reputation grows through real use and verified activity.
No single company controls trust.

Built for builders. Ready for enterprises.

Agent JS SDK with Lang Chain support

Secure key management (HSMs, MPC, Lit Protocol)

On chain attestation registry

Enterprise level security, privacy, and audits
Built for real-world use from day one.
Request Private Access
Know Your Agent is currently available via private access for selected Billions Network partners.

Builders -  Request access to agent identity and attestations using the Agent JS SDK
Enterprises: Contact us to deploy accountable AI systems safely.

If you think Billions is just for human verification. nah, thatâ€™s only half. AI agents today can talk, do tasks, move money, even handle data. But most have no way to show who made them or whoâ€™s responsible.

Thatâ€™s where KYA comes in. Itâ€™s basically an on-chain identity system for AI.

- Ownership is locked on-chain

Today, I want to share something truly personal and creative with you all.

Inspired by @billions_ntwk, I spent time crafting a handmade piece of art  a custom mask. Each one was carefully cut with scissors and created with full attention and heart. It wasnâ€™t just art it was a reflection of connection.

While working on it, I felt that same childhood joy again the kind that comes when you create something with your own hands and soul. I captured the whole process in photos and videos so I can always remember this beautiful moment.

To me, Billions is more than just a network itâ€™s a family. And this small creation is my humble way of giving something back to the community that inspires me every single day.

Thank you for being part of this incredible journey.

Much love always ğŸ’™

What is Know Your Agent?

Know Your Agent is a system that gives AI agents a verifiable identity, a clear owner, a public, composable reputation.
Built on Deep Trust, it connects AI agents, humans, and organizations through cryptographic identity and public attestations, without sacrificing privacy or decentralization.

AI agents are everywhere.
They talk to users, execute actions, and make decisions that matter.
But guess what? most AI agents still operate without a real identity.
Without identity, there is no accountability, and without accountability, trust breaks.

@billions_ntwk Know Your Agent fixes this and restores accountability of these agents. 

Why this matters now?

AI agents are no longer experiments. They are becoming economic and operational actors.
Enterprises need accountability
Builders need open infrastructure
Users need trust without relying on third parties.
